title: Personal Portfolio
description: Explore the personal portfolio of Maria Anne San Andres, a React developer who designed and built this site from the ground up. Leveraging Tailwind CSS, it effectively presents diverse skills and credentials through a thoughtfully crafted user experience.

title: Chef Claude
description: Chef Claude is a React-based web application that helps users generate recipe ideas based on the ingredients they have on hand. The project concept was inspired by a Scrimba tutorial, and the implementation was developed independently.

title: Travel Journal
description: A simple React-based travel journal web application built with Tailwind CSS. Users can view a list of travel destinations, each with photos, descriptions, and Google Maps links. Layout is inspired by Scrimba
